settings.content: FAQ: [Home Page Sections](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1730774-parallax-home-page-content-layout) | [Dropdown Menu](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942350-creating-a-dropdown-menu) | [Adding Tabs](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942364-adding-tabs) | [Sale Banners](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942366-products-on-sale) | [Related Products](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942378-related-products) | [Home Page Featured Links](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942377) | [Page of Collections](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1132818-page-of-collections) | [Content Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942365) | [Product Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1059911) | [Adding Columns](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1033987)
If you need any assistance, please contact [support@outofthesandbox.com](mailto:support@outofthesandbox.com)

settings.label: Enable styled tables
settings.info: This will add borders and padding to your tables

settings.label: New, pre-order, and coming soon banners
Enable header background transparency
settings.info: This will make the header semi-transparent throughout the shop

settings.label: Use a password page background image
Stretch background to fill the password page

settings.label: Use a logo over the home page slideshow
Number of main menu dropdown links in first column ([?](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942350-creating-a-dropdown-menu))
Featured content (below navigation on all pages except home page)

settings.content: Choose the order of your home page sections. The slideshow will always be displayed at the top of the page.
For best results, upload images that are around 1280px in width and under 600px in height. Try to keep your slideshow images the same size.

settings.label: Position behind main menu
settings.info: This will determine whether a solid background or the slideshow image is behind the main menu

settings.content: This section can feature 3 images that can link to any content in the shop.
Show links to featured collections, products, pages, and blogs.
Show a collection of featured products in the standard column grid layout.
Feature a single or multiple products in full detail to purchase directly from the home page.
Show recent blog articles on the home page.

settings.label: Show quick shop full product description
Shipping rates calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Show full article link for article excerpts
Show additional articles on article page
Show article banner image
settings.info: The article's featured image will be used as a full-width banner

settings.label: Enable [DISQUS](http://disqus.com/) comments (instead of Shopify's default comments)

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
Although you will be able to display prices on your storefront in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: To test this feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to test mode.

settings.label: Days until popup is displayed again

settings.content: Add province, county, district fields for customers in Costa Rica.
Add inputs to capture checkout attributes at the customer information step of checkout.
If any attribute names are the same as an attribute saved on storefront, the field in checkout will overwrite it.

settings.label: Section title
settings.info: Required field. If nothing is entered, the title will default to 'Customer notes'.

settings.label: Section explanation
settings.info: Optional field to write more about the purpose of the section

settings.label: Label for attribute field
settings.info: Label displayed to customers. If nothing is entered, the label will default to 'Notes'.

settings.label: Attribute name
settings.info: Set the value of the attribute to be stored in the admin.  If nothing is entered, the attribute will default to 'Customer notes'.

settings.label: Set attribute as a required field
Error message
settings.info: Displayed when the required field is left blank. Default message is 'Error'.
